mapper.insert: insert into message(no, content, send, receive, reg) values(message_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{send}, #{receive}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from message where send=#{send} and receive=#{receive} or send=#{receive} and receive=#{send} order by reg asc
mapper.update: update message set read = 1 where read = 0 and send=#{receive} and receive=#{send}
